# Edward J. Watts

Edward J. Watts is an American classical historian and writer. He is a professor of history at University of California, where he has co-directed the San Diego Center for Hellenic Studies.
Books
* The Eternal Decline and Fall of Rome: The History of a Dangerous Idea (2021)
* The Romans: A 2,000-Year History (2025)
* Mortal Republic: How Rome Fell Into Tyranny (2018)
* Hypatia: The Life and Legend of an Ancient Philosopher (2017)
* The Final Pagan Generation (2015)
